document.full_text: roger federer refused to panic or blame the blustery conditions after friday's defeat by juergen melzer in the monte carlo masters quarter-finals threatened to blow his career further off course.
document.title: federer's aura further blown away by melzer
lines_and_colors: roger federer refused to panic or blame the blustery conditions after friday's defeat by juergen melzer in the monte carlo masters quarter-finals threatened to blow his career further off course.
